glsa.title: libgssglue: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in libgssglue may allow a local attacker to gain escalated privileges.

background.p: libgssglue exports a GSSAPI interface which calls other random GSSAPI libraries.

description.p: libgssglue does not securely use getenv() when loading a library for a setuid application.

impact.p: A local attacker could gain escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libgssglue users should upgrade to the latest version:
